      • setFirstDayOfWeek

        public CalendarView2.StateBuilder setFirstDayOfWeek(int day)
        Sets the first day of the week.

        Uses the java.util.Calendar day constants.

        Parameters:
        day - The first day of the week as a java.util.Calendar day constant.
        See Also:
        Calendar

      • setCalendarDisplayMode

        public CalendarView2.StateBuilder setCalendarDisplayMode(CalendarMode mode)
        Set calendar display mode. The default mode is Months. When switching between modes will selectRanges todays date, or the selected date, if selection mode is single.
        Parameters:
        mode - - calendar mode

      • isCacheCalendarPositionEnabled

        public CalendarView2.StateBuilder isCacheCalendarPositionEnabled(boolean cacheCurrentPosition)
        Use this method to enable saving the current position when switching between week and month mode. By default, the calendar update to the latest selected date or the current date. When set to true, the view will used the month that the calendar is currently on.
        Parameters:
        cacheCurrentPosition - Set to true to cache the current position, false otherwise.
